abstractText: A paper manuscript of the Suvarṇaprabhāsa, a fundamental and very popular sūtra on various topics of mahāyāna Buddhism (philosophy, medicine, legends, dhāraṇīs etc.), dating to no later than the early 5th century CE. In Nepal it is considered to be one of the nine dharmas.
abstractShort: A paper manuscript of the Suvarṇaprabhāsa, a fundamental and very popular sūtra on various topics of mahāyāna Buddhism (philosophy,
title: Suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtra
